sent.orig: Millimeter by millimeter, the tumor began to disappear.
sent.trans: 肿瘤一点一点地开始消失。

sent.orig: Turfy not too fine, pearlite grain diameter 3-4 millimeter, vermiculite grain diameter 3-5 millimeter are idealer.
sent.trans: 泥炭不要太细，珍珠岩颗粒直径3-4毫米，蛭石颗粒直径3-5毫米比较理想。

sent.orig: Detail space to millimeter, make full use of each inch of space. elevate space rate.
sent.trans: 空间细化到毫米，充分利用每一寸空间，有效提高空间利用率。

sent.orig: In recent years, Defected Ground Structure(_DGS) is widely used in microwave circuit and millimeter circuit.
sent.trans: 近年来，DGS(Defected Ground structure)在微波毫米波电路中得到广泛的应用。

sent.orig: I commonly use the Olympus 100 millimeter telephoto lens.
sent.trans: i普遍使用奥林巴斯100毫米远摄镜头。
